description:
For the noVNC flash websocket emulation to work, nova-vncproxy needs to respond with a flash socket policy
allowing the browser to connect.
title: Flash websocket emulation doesn't work with nova-vncproxy

comments.content:
For the noVNC flash websocket emulation to work, nova-vncproxy needs to respond with a flash socket policy
allowing the browser to connect.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jimmy-sigint
